00034 /******************************************************************************
00035                            Definitions section
00036 ******************************************************************************/
00037 #define PROFILE_ID_SMART_ENERGY  CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0109)
00038 #define PROFILE_ID_CBA CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0105)
00039 #define PROFILE_ID_HOME_AUTOMATION CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0104)
00040 #define PROFILE_ID_LIGHT_LINK CCPU_TO_LE16(0xc05e)
00041 
00042 // Macros defines the maximum size allocated for a value of type OCTET_STRING
00043 #define OCTET_STRING_MAX_SIZE 255
00044 #define LONG_OCTET_STRING_MAX_SIZE 65535
00045 
00046 
00047 #define ZCL_REQ_INIT_VAL               0x00
00048 #define ZCL_REQ_FLAG_RESP_RCVD         0x01
00049 #define ZCL_REQ_FLAG_CONF_RCVD         0x02
00050 #define ZCL_REQ_RESP_CONF_MASK         (0x02 | 0x01)
00051 #define ZCL_REQ_RESP_RQRD              0x04
00052 #define ZCL_REQ_RESP_RQRD_MASK         0x04
00053 #define ZCL_REQ_DEFAULT_RESP_RQRD      0x08
00054 
00055 /*
00056   ZCL header consists of
00057     Frame control - 1 byte
00058     Manufacturer code - 2(0 for ZCL_IMAGE_BLOCK_RESP)
00059     Txn seq. Number - 1 byte
00060     Command ID - 1 byte
00061 */
00062 #define ZCL_FRAME_HEADER_SIZE sizeof(ZclFrameHeader_t)
00063 #define ZCL_FRAME_STANDARD_HEADER_SIZE (sizeof(ZclFrameHeader_t) - sizeof(uint16_t))
00064 
00076 #ifndef ZCL_MAX_RX_ZSDU_SIZE
00077 #if ((CS_APS_MAX_BLOCKS_AMOUNT > 1) && ( (CS_APS_MAX_BLOCKS_AMOUNT * CS_APS_RX_BLOCK_SIZE) > \
00078                                           (APS_MAX_NON_SECURITY_ASDU_SIZE - APS_DATA_EXTENDED_HEADER_LENGTH) ))
00079   #define ZCL_MAX_RX_ZSDU_SIZE (CS_APS_MAX_BLOCKS_AMOUNT * CS_APS_RX_BLOCK_SIZE)
00080 #else
00081   #define ZCL_MAX_RX_ZSDU_SIZE (APS_MAX_NON_SECURITY_ASDU_SIZE + NWK_MAX_SOURCE_ROUTE_SUBFRAME_LENGTH)
00082 #endif
00083 #endif
00084 
00085 
00097 #ifndef ZCL_MAX_TX_ZSDU_SIZE
00098 #if ((CS_APS_MAX_BLOCKS_AMOUNT > 1) && ((CS_APS_MAX_BLOCKS_AMOUNT * CS_APS_TX_BLOCK_SIZE) > APS_MAX_ASDU_SIZE))
00099   #define ZCL_MAX_TX_ZSDU_SIZE (CS_APS_MAX_BLOCKS_AMOUNT * CS_APS_TX_BLOCK_SIZE)
00100 #else
00101   #define ZCL_MAX_TX_ZSDU_SIZE (APS_MAX_NON_SECURITY_ASDU_SIZE + NWK_MAX_SOURCE_ROUTE_SUBFRAME_LENGTH)
00102 #endif
00103 #endif
00104 
00105 #define ZCL_GET_CLUSTER_DIR_MASK   0x01
00106 #define ZCL_GET_CLUSTER_MSP_MASK   0x02
00107

00118 /***************************************************************************/
00121 typedef enum PACK
00122 {
00124   ZCL_SUCCESS_STATUS                      = 0x00,
00126   ZCL_FAILURE_STATUS                      = 0x01,
00127 
00128   //0x02 - 0x7d - Reserved
00130   ZCL_INVALID_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_STATUS      = 0x02,
00132   ZCL_TC_PERMISSION_TABLE_ERROR_STATUS    = 0x03,
00134   ZCL_APS_LINK_KEY_ERROR_STATUS           = 0x04,
00136   ZCL_WRITE_ATTRIBUTES_FAILURE_STATUS     = 0x0f,
00137 
00139   ZCL_NOT_AUTHORIZED_STATUS               = 0x7e,
00140   
00141    /* CCB 2318 a reserved field may be used in the future and then be non-zero
00142       ZCL_RESERVED_FIELD_NOT_ZERO_STATUS      = 0x7f,*/
00147   ZCL_MALFORMED_COMMAND_STATUS            = 0x80,
00150   ZCL_UNSUP_CLUSTER_COMMAND_STATUS        = 0x81,
00152   ZCL_UNSUP_GENERAL_COMMAND_STATUS        = 0x82,
00156   ZCL_UNSUP_MANUF_CLUSTER_COMMAND         = 0x83,
00160   ZCL_UNSUP_MANUF_GENERAL_COMMAND_STATUS  = 0x84,
00163   ZCL_INVALID_FIELD_STATUS                = 0x85,
00165   ZCL_UNSUPPORTED_ATTRIBUTE_STATUS        = 0x86,
00168   ZCL_INVALID_VALUE_STATUS                = 0x87,
00170   ZCL_READ_ONLY_STATUS                    = 0x88,
00173   ZCL_INSUFFICIENT_SPACE_STATUS           = 0x89,
00176   ZCL_DUPLICATE_EXISTS_STATUS             = 0x8a,
00178   ZCL_NOT_FOUND_STATUS                    = 0x8b,
00180   ZCL_UNREPORTABLE_ATTRIBUTE_STATUS       = 0x8c,
00182   ZCL_INVALID_DATA_TYPE_STATUS            = 0x8d,
00184   ZCL_INVALID_SELECTOR_STATUS             = 0x8e,
00187   ZCL_WRITE_ONLY_STATUS                   = 0x8f,
00190   ZCL_INCONSISTENT_STARTUP_STATE_STATUS   = 0x90,
00193   ZCL_DEFINED_OUT_OF_BAND_STATUS          = 0x91,
00194   /*The supplied values (e.g., contents of table cells) are
00195       inconsistent. */
00196   ZCL_INCONSISTENT_STATUS                 = 0x92,
00197   /*The credentials presented by the device sending the
00198       command are not sufficient to perform this action*/
00199   ZCL_ACTION_DENIED_STATUS                = 0x93, 
00201   ZCL_TIMEOUT_STATUS                      = 0x94,
00203   ZCL_ABORT_STATUS                        = 0x95,
00205   ZCL_INVALID_IMAGE_STATUS                = 0x96,
00207   ZCL_WAIT_FOR_DATA_STATUS                = 0x97,
00209   ZCL_NO_IMAGE_AVAILABLE_STATUS           = 0x98,
00211   ZCL_REQUIRE_MORE_IMAGE_STATUS           = 0x99,
00212   /*The command has been received and is being processed*/
00213   ZCL_NOTIFICATION_PENDING_STATUS         = 0x9a,
00214   //0x97 - 0xbf - Reserved
00215   /* Request was successfully processed, but application is forcing to reply with DefaultResponse */
00216   ZCL_SUCCESS_WITH_DEFAULT_RESPONSE_STATUS = 0xAA,
00217 
00219   ZCL_HARDWARE_FAILURE_STATUS             = 0xc0,
00221   ZCL_SOFTWARE_FAILURE_STATUS             = 0xc1,
00223   ZCL_CALIBRATION_ERROR_STATUS            = 0xc2,
00224   /*The cluster is not supported*/
00225   ZCL_UNSUP_CLUSTER_STATUS          = 0xc3,
00226   /* Limit of attribute range reached. Value is trimmed to closest limit (maximum or minimum) */
00227   ZCL_LIMIT_REACHED_STATUS                = 0xc4,
00228     
00229   ZCL_BAD_FRAME_STATUS                    = 0xc5,
00230 
00231   ZCL_WRONG_RESPONSE_LENGTH_STATUS        = 0xc6,
00232     
00235   ZCL_END_PAYLOAD_REACHED_STATUS          = 0xfd,
00236   ZCL_MAX_PAYLOAD_REACHED_STATUS          = 0xfe,
00238   ZCL_INVALID_PARAMETER_STATUS            = 0xff,
00239 
00240 } ZCL_Status_t;

00255 typedef enum
00256 {
00257   //Null
00258   ZCL_NO_DATA_TYPE_ID                       = 0x00,
00259 
00260   //General data
00261   ZCL_8BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                     = 0x08,
00262   ZCL_16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                    = 0x09,
00263   ZCL_24BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                    = 0x0a,
00264   ZCL_32BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                    = 0x0b,
00265   ZCL_40BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                    = 0x0c,
00266   ZCL_48BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                    = 0x0d,
00267   ZCL_56BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                    = 0x0e,
00268   ZCL_64BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                    = 0x0f,
00269 
00270   //Logical
00271   ZCL_BOOLEAN_DATA_TYPE_ID                  = 0x10,
00272 
00273   //Bitmap
00274   ZCL_8BIT_BITMAP_DATA_TYPE_ID              = 0x18,
00275   ZCL_16BIT_BITMAP_DATA_TYPE_ID             = 0x19,
00276   ZCL_24BIT_BITMAP_DATA_TYPE_ID             = 0x1a,
00277   ZCL_32BIT_BITMAP_DATA_TYPE_ID             = 0x1b,
00278   ZCL_40BIT_BITMAP_DATA_TYPE_ID             = 0x1c,
00279   ZCL_48BIT_BITMAP_DATA_TYPE_ID             = 0x1d,
00280   ZCL_56BIT_BITMAP_DATA_TYPE_ID             = 0x1e,
00281   ZCL_64BIT_BITMAP_DATA_TYPE_ID             = 0x1f,
00282 
00283   //Unsigned integer
00284   ZCL_U8BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                    = 0x20,
00285   ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                   = 0x21,
00286   ZCL_U24BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                   = 0x22,
00287   ZCL_U32BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                   = 0x23,
00288   ZCL_U40BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                   = 0x24,
00289   ZCL_U48BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                   = 0x25,
00290   ZCL_U56BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                   = 0x26,
00291   ZCL_U64BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                   = 0x27,
00292 
00293   //Signed integer
00294   ZCL_S8BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                    = 0x28,
00295   ZCL_S16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                   = 0x29,
00296   ZCL_S24BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                   = 0x2a,
00297   ZCL_S32BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                   = 0x2b,
00298   ZCL_S40BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                   = 0x2c,
00299   ZCL_S48BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                   = 0x2d,
00300   ZCL_S56BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                   = 0x2e,
00301   ZCL_S64BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID                   = 0x2f,
00302 
00303   //Enumeration
00304   ZCL_8BIT_ENUM_DATA_TYPE_ID                = 0x30,
00305   ZCL_16BIT_ENUM_DATA_TYPE_ID               = 0x31,
00306 
00307   //Floating point
00308   ZCL_FSEMI_PRECISION_DATA_TYPE_ID          = 0x38,
00309   ZCL_FSINGLE_PRECISION_DATA_TYPE_ID        = 0x39,
00310   ZCL_FDOUBLE_PRECISION_DATA_TYPE_ID        = 0x3a,
00311 
00312   //String
00313   ZCL_OCTET_STRING_DATA_TYPE_ID             = 0x41,
00314   ZCL_CHARACTER_STRING_DATA_TYPE_ID         = 0x42,
00315   ZCL_LONG_OCTET_STRING_DATA_TYPE_ID        = 0x43,
00316   ZCL_LONG_CHARACTER_STRING_DATA_TYPE_ID    = 0x44,
00317 
00318   //Ordered sequence
00319   ZCL_ARRAY_DATA_TYPE_ID                    = 0x48,
00320   ZCL_STRUCTURE_DATA_TYPE_ID                = 0x4c,
00321 
00322   //Collection
00323   ZCL_SET_DATA_TYPE_ID                      = 0x50,
00324   ZCL_BAG_DATA_TYPE_ID                      = 0x51,
00325 
00326   //Time
00327   ZCL_TIME_OF_DAY_DATA_TYPE_ID              = 0xe0,
00328   ZCL_DATE_DATA_TYPE_ID                     = 0xe1,
00329   ZCL_UTC_TIME_DATA_TYPE_ID                 = 0xe2,
00330 
00331   //Identifier
00332   ZCL_CLUSTER_ID_DATA_TYPE_ID               = 0xe8,
00333   ZCL_ATTRIBUTE_ID_DATA_TYPE_ID             = 0xe9,
00334   ZCL_BACNET_OID_DATA_TYPE_ID               = 0xea,
00335 
00336   //Misscellaneous
00337   ZCL_IEEE_ADDRESS_DATA_TYPE_ID             = 0xf0,
00338   ZCL_128BIT_SECURITY_KEY_DATA_TYPE_ID      = 0xf1,
00339 } ZCL_AttributeType_t;

00741 typedef struct
00742 {

00751   void (*ZCL_ReportInd)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t reportLength, uint8_t *reportPayload);
00753   void (*ZCL_DefaultRespInd)(ZCL_Request_t *req, ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, uint8_t *payload);
00755   void (*ZCL_AttributeEventInd)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, ZCL_AttributeId_t attributeId, ZCL_AttributeEvent_t event);
00756 } ZCL_Cluster_t;
